i work as a plane technician in the iaf israeli air force thats the kind of job you dont really get to choose they draft you and bam youre a technicianit pays really bad less than 1 an hour and youre kind of stuck there for three years and i know it sound stupid to think about killing yourself when the misery ends in three years but hear me outi get treated like crap every single day there are no benefits and its really hard workinthesun work they got me to the point where i just dont care about absolutely anythingi halfass my work i dont care when im coming home and i just dont care about any thing or anyone i dont have friends here and everyone hates me for not doing my job because it falls on themive asked for professional help and they told me theyll take care if it but no one ever does these are empty promises made to keep you in the systemits all just way to hard for me i came into the forces a fragile person who tried to commit suicide once but was stopped just in time no one ever bothered reporting it and its a closed family secret theres really no other way this past year has been so hard it felt like 10 10 very lonely and difficult years

ive been feeling suicidal onoff now for a few weeks and im terrified of what i might dofor some background im a trans woman currently studying for my masters in plant science but lately i feel like things have just been stacking up higher and higher and it seems like the only way out is suicide im reasonably sure that thats depression talking but its just so hard to see any sort of good coming out of things in the future it seems that like whenever things get rough my default goto response is to seriously consider killing myself and im terrified that one day i might actually end up going through with itive been trying to see a pysch with the university but i learnt today not even three hours way from my appointment that my psych was sick and that shed have to reschedule shes pretty much the only psych at the university that works with trans people and shell be going on vacation in about two weeks so i will probably only have the one session if i think that shes not terrible im considering seeing her at her private practice during the summer ive also considered trying to see another psych here that does work over the summer but given how the person i saw for my assessment when i first showed up as a result of feeling suicidal thought that referring to a trans guy as her friends daughter was perfectly fine even after a supposed sensitivity workshop with regards to trans issues im more than a little dubious of the quality of the psychological care id receive from people who dont specialize in dealing with trans peopleive been finding that the university has been a pretty shitty environment part of this is due to the repeated incidents of not respecting their own preferred name and from less than one week in my first term an actualy legal name change that was also filed with the university policies due to what seems to be incompetence and departments never speaking to one another a welldocumented complaint about this to the dean of students has yielded nothing to date despite assurances that i would been contacted with results of the investigation within 23 months its been four and a half months the actual work im supposed to be doing since my productivity has been just about nil in the past two or three months is shitty and painful yay for manipulating metal at 20 to 25c for hours on end without being able to use anything more substantial than nitrile gloves to protect my hands but maybe i just need to toughen up or something a simple meeting with my supervisor or even just contemplating to go in to the lab in the morning to work has managed to leave me feeling shaky nauseous scared and contemplating killing myself on more than one occasion ive heard from most people that graduate school is supposed to be tough and make you feel miserable but it shouldnt be making you feel like youre actually going to kill yourselfwhen i tried going to see a counselor about when i first started feeling suicidal maybe a month ago or something i dont remember exactly i basically got a tough love sort of approach to things that basically summed up to life sucks and shits unlikely to get better youre going to have to learn to find the less shitty bits and have those carry you through the rest of the time which i found to be pretty unhelpfulother than this however life is pretty nice but it just feels like it doesnt matter and that every once in a while especially around times of high stress my brain will just go back into seriously considering suicide including methods of doing soim not even sure what this post is about at this point and i dont know if i want advice compassion or even just to be able to rantbitchmoan about things but i figured that this would be a good place to go

everyones always told if they are suicidal they should get help im reminded of this often but what are they really going to do for me i know they arent going to solve any of my problems nobody is going to really solve my problems nobody is going to rewind time and erase whats been done to me nobody is going to volunteer to put money in my pocket so what is the point of telling a professional youre suicidal to me it seems totally counterproductive like the only people who would contact these crisis lines are the people i despise people who claim they are suicidal but just want attentioni dont want attention i just want to fucking die already i want to crawl into a hole and die because anything beats continuing to bear the situation i am in right now and the worse direction it is headingso if instead of ending my life i decide to call one of these people and ask for help first what are they really going to do for me besides remove my one last option that is guaranteed to free me from sufferingive sought help for depression already from more than one source and between different doctors medications and therapists ive concluded that i basically cant be fixed i should just get over it and force myself to accept that life is basically going to be shit for me and i should instead be happy about that fact and look forward to my future well i know that is a load of shit and i dont have a future and i never really felt that i didi think i am doing everyone a favor here i tried to get help and gave it a big effort and gave it several big chances but im over 30 now and back at square one i think its safe to conclude i cant be fixed and its better for everyone if the doctors and other valuable people spend their time on someone who can be saved instead of a lost cause like me

my story started the 4th of january 2013 it hasnt been going great for a long long time 23 years and i knew i was strugging my girlfriend at the time _person_ knew i was struggling as well i broke up with her 2 days prior to this as i just no longer saw a future i did not have any feelings left and felt empty i couldnt sleep for the longest time until it hit me it was me i was the person that had a problemin a moment of panic and realisation what i had done i called my _person_ awake and went over to her place in tears panic i spilled my story as best as i could for that moment and begged her to come back to me we decided we would give it another shot and i would go look for help i managed to find help someone to talk to every week we had meetings and talked about things but it didnt feel like i was hitting the core of my issues we then decided i would go to another psychologist she advised me who specliased in system therapy not knowing what i would get myself into i accepted and went there it didnt take him very long to crack me i can safely say i experienced the worst pain agony and grief that i had ever felt within 15 minutes of walking in there to cut a long story a bit shorter there i have a deceased brother who died at the age of 6 months he died years before i would be born but the long lasting effects of such tragedy my parents never managed to deal with it and being the next boy to be born i carried the burden i was not only being myself i was also my older brother i acted cared protected as if i were 2 persons i was literally keeping the family together my sisters each had their own boatload of trouble during their puberty my father eventually broke down and spent 3 months internally to get mental help my mother well she never managed to get over the loss of her first son finally after more then 9 months after the 4th of january i managed to finally start working on getting a healthy relationship with my mother this basically boiled down to me not being allowed to listen to her problems i was no longer allowed to be the person in her life my dad had to reinvent that out of all the things that happened out of all the things that managed to change in that period this was the only thing i think lasted i literally care for people i protect people i listen to endless amounts of storiesproblems from people because that is what i learned to do i learned to listen take it all up and then tell people it would get better hell i learned how to give advice and perhaps that caused more people to empty their hearts to me in the end i simply cannot give anymore im tired just so tired even after completing all those sessions learning things about how people work learning about how i work i was just exhausted i could no longer give care or anything i eventually broke up with _person_ after all the hell weve been through it was harsh it was 1sided and at the time seemed like the best thing to do i simply did not have the energy to be in this relationship we were perfect for eachother i was raised to care for people she lost her father at an early age and was looking for a father figure it was perfect but unhealthy i had to get out even though she is the person that i want to marrywe are now what 9 months later and things were going for the worse it went really good for some time i managed to pick up my study economics teacher i managed to get some energy back and everything seemed fine but things happened and it changed me first off was _person_ a lovely girl a few years older she has a relationship but was looking for some adventure at first i thought i was doing something right but after making out several weeks outside her apartment i started to realise what was happening i wasnt seducing this girl i was her escape from her misserable relationship voilá 3 weeks later her friend had chirgury to reduce the headaches has recovered from that and is feeling great again guess what way the attention went ill save you the details on other things that happen but one thing never changed plenty of people wanted my attention plenty of people wanted to speak out their problems they wanted someone that listens to them and helps them get through it still knowing what happens i cannot resist its who i am or at least who i think i amover the weeks that came after i just started slipping i know what is happening to me i know exactly what is happening im having a fullblown fallback that exact feeling is coming back to me and its terrifying but its different previously i was just afraid i was scared i was angry and i didnt understand this time however i do understand i am full aware of what is happening to me and i think i stopped caring last saturday i went out with several people and it was a fun night plenty happened with the people i was out with but i just snapped something in my mind said fuck this i have been scared angry and all those things but now i just dont believe it will improve i emptied my heart to a friend of mine and she basically said no you are not going to end yourself i will not allow it and that did great things to me it did me great i felt new energy for a few hours it didnt last longwhat followed were the worst days of fear i had ever lived i am afraid when i wake up i am afraid to go to bed if i dont hypnotize myself with some dumb game or activity i can only think about how mad i am how sad i am how i dont believe in any person willing to help me i fantasise about walking across the highway i want to feel what it is like to have my life hanging in the palm of my end i embrace the feeling of ending it i refuse to i m not going to i think but these thoughts have been the warmest thoughts i have had in a long time it is as death is the person i love and cherish its like something is welcoming me to release of all this pain this grief this never changing cycle but you know i still had people out there i still had a few people that i trust that if i were to be in real pain or trouble i could talk to so i texted _person_ the one person above everyone else that i trust she promised me when we broke up that if there was ever a problem or something like this that she would be there she made me promise to tell her and shed be there out of all the people in the world if i was about to kill myself _person_ was the one i should call and she just didnt respond she saw my messages she knows very well what is happening to me and she doesnt care enough to listen 8 days from now i turn 25 i live in a world that does not care about the people around them if there is any chance of them not having to listen to others they will take it they will opt out because they are unable to listen i live in a world where a person will not return the favor that you did oh so very often for them i live in a world that would rather say at the funeral why didnt we listen to him then to actually pay attention to what is happening not to long ago i read gt some people are already death they just dont know it yet i am not going to commit suicide i died the 4th of january 2013 its just a matter of time now when i decide my body should be buried

long story short theres a girl i love we were together for almost a year before circumstances drove us apart this was the best time of my life without comparison we had no real issues just bad luck when it was over i was crushed i put on 15 kilos lacked motivation and hated myself i saw her again today shes seeing someone else ive been borderline suicidal my whole life constant bullying throughout school and the death of my father which i witnessed being major contributors but ive never felt like ive been stripped of a portion of myself now i dont even have anyone to give me a hug and the bolte bridge is looking real friendly im scared of myself and im scared of my world im scared of this empty feeling in my chest that stops me breathing properly i hate my throat that makes me feel like im choking on tears every day im sick of not being able to be happy if i dont feel better again by the end of the week i dont think ill be going any further

ive struggled off and on with depression for the last decade but i always felt secure that suicide was never going to enter the equation i had this worldview that prevented those thoughts from ever coming upbut for the first time ever i feel as though it might be a good time to leave this world theres a lot of reasons why but what it all comes down to is that im tired really tired tired of searching for solutions tired to struggling tired of tryingi was going to see about getting student loans and going to get an engineering certificate so i could earn more than 10 an hour at a parttime retail job but i dont care anymore so what if i did i could never work fulltime im working 30 hours now and when i come home every day im so exhausted i can barely speak coherently all i do is come home feed the animals and then go to bed again 40 hours a week is not something i could ever doi thought about pursuing another dream of mine but by the time i get the money to do it ill be too old to enroll the dream is to try out the temporary monastic ordination program at a buddhist abbey in canada theres an age cutoff by the time i save up for it im sure id be beyond that limiti have a lot of other things id like to do and see nothing really crazy but i know ill never earn enough money to do so ill never earn enough to even get my teeth fixedi know i should go see a doctor to get a referral to a psychologist andor therapist and ive been down that road before but it didnt really lead anywhere while i was receiving help i felt great but it never lasted while i was talking to a therapist i would be lighthearted insightful optimistic i would feel great an hour later id feel good an hour after that id feel okay later on id feel dull and by the end of the day id feel like shit againbut as soon as my next therapy session came around id be all sunshine and positive attitude id have all the answers all the motivation all the drive and passion in that one room talking to a stranger then id leave that room and itd all evaporate like a dream i sought help and i got it but it was no good to meive thought about the people id hurt if i left my mom would be devastated i know she has her first grandchild through my younger brother now just a month old i figured my niece would be a good way for my mom to sublimate her grief new life to take the edge off the loss of mine my best friend who until six months ago was the man i was going to marry would be hurt because im sure he would never see it coming i dont want to hurt him but i know him hell be fine hell move on and hell continue to lead an enviable life full of friends and lovers and traveli thought that i could go on living for all these people in my life that i at least had the energy to do that even if my life was small and meaningless but i dont feel like i have the energy to do even that i cant think of any other way to sustain myself while still addressing my emotional needs i cant not work and still pay the bills and receive professional help and indulge in small joys here and thereim nearly 32 years old dont have a licensecar work in retail was kicked out of university and am in debt to student loans to the tune of 20k that i cant pay back ive missed years of income tax refunds that i cant figure out how to file nor can i afford the help to get them done even if i could i have a really bad memory i put the tax return forms right next to my laptop so i would remember to do them but despite that i just keep forgettingi want to be able to make life at home with my best friend better but i can never think of ways to help out around the house ill come home and hell have done something to improve our lives thats simple and obvious and i hate that i cant think creatively like that i just want to show him that im not neglectful i really want to help i just dont know howand all this struggle has really taken a lot out of me trying to get better has exhausted me and i dont feel like i have anything left ive reached that point of being perfectly at peace with leaving this world im at peace with the idea that i will completely cease to exist no afterlife it wouldnt even be rest because thered be no me to do any resting im okay with that i dont really care about resting anyway i just feel done and yet part of me is nagging me to write thisive been going through some difficulty and for about a month there things were looking up but i was just in denial about what i feel is the reality of my life i didnt want to face it because it hurt too much to accept but i cant fix anything if i dont face whats wrongand now that im facing whats wrong i can see no way out so rather than face a lifetime of poverty poor health and uselessness ive decided that im going to end my life i havent decided how yet but it is going to happen it has to happen i wont give myself any alternativesid like to thank reddit all of reddit never before have i been so inspired depressed interested informed angered or educated in my life im pretty confident that if it werent for reddit i wouldnt have survived even this long

when it gets like this its so awful i want to curl up in a ball and at the same time throw things run for miles a lot of the time i just want to rip my brain from my skull and throw it against the wall stop just stop no i cant dont you see its actually impossible nothing is right there is no solution to life if i had a gun things would be so much simpler that would stop this stupid brainbut i hold on to my heart for a second think about something stupid look at that email whats it about oh its spam read it top to bottom now ive forgotten my panic for a moment now that reminder kicks in dont trust your judgement when you get the urge to rip your brain out of your head now i see i remember that its not the right choice supposedly carry on a little more wearily just a little more tired my hope just a little more ragged life is just a little heavier carry onwhen it gets like this its so awfuli just wanted you guys to know last night i was surfing reddit and a post from sw came up and i read it and i realized that i didnt have the active desire to kill myself i realized that all day yesterday i hadnt thought once about suicide yesterday was the first day in three years that i didnt think about killing myself i guess things do change

weve been friends for over 10 years living together for the last 2 ive been noticing something wrong for the last few weeks quiet in the room but not really there he was away over the weekend with his parents and when he came back he said he and his mom had gotten into a fight which i dont believe is normal for them when i got home from work today i didnt see him so i got changed and knocked on his door to see if he was home i didnt hear a response but i knew he was home for some reason i opened his door and saw him sleeping in his bed no big deal i thought even though it was almost 7pm he keeps a strange schedule sometimes so it wasnt totally out of the ordinary i let him sleepabout an hour later he comes out very groggy goes to the bathroom and heads out to get cigarettes and beer he goes into our back room to smoke and i follow trying to get a feel on whats going on with him he then tells me that he took sleeping pills and alcohol that afternoon to try to kill himself obviously i was and am in shock and didnt really know how to react i asked questions about why and for how long hed felt like this we hugged it out at the end of the night and i told him i was there for him no work is too important that he couldnt call me in the middle of the day and id be thereas a friend i try not to pry too much and like to let my friends know im there to talk but on their terms when theyre ready i just dont know what to do next i said i wouldnt tell anyone but i feel like i need help now he said he told his parents so im not alone but how can i best approach this as his friend and someone who wants to prevent this from ever happening againtldr do i tell other friends to set up some kind of immediate support for him do i suggest counseling as someone whos never been in this situation before what do i do

during a depressed period during my high school years i contemplated suicide fortunately i sought help from professionals before doing anything and came out much better for it yet what one person whom i went to school with said when they found out i was suicidal has stuck with me forever and i will always owe that person a debti was selfish at the time thought only of myself as teenagers often do i figured it was my life i could do what i wanted with itthat girl told me a simple line i wish the world could knowyour life is not entirely your ownyou are your parents child your grandparents grandchild your friends friend you are your siblings sibling your loves love and above all you are a part of the lives of everyone around you your leaving doesnt effect just you it effects everyone youve ever known who learns of your passing your leaving causes pain hurt loss your life is not entirely your ownfrom this i have tried to live the best life i can while we can because my life means more than just my existencethis does not mean you shouldnt kill yourself out of guilt to what pain you will cause when you leave it means you should find reasons to live and be great life is great when you remember to enjoy the simple things take a shower and feel the water sit down in the shower its wonderful and worth living for use cold water to remind you how nice hot water is use hot water to remind you how good cold water is walk outside and breath the air see the sky the ground and the leaves taste food smell everything feel something soft we take for granted every day the best things in life smile at someone just because you can its amazing how many smiles you get back that just make your day depression surely sucks it makes everything bland and sad that doesnt mean it has to define you some of the greatest people who ever lived suffered from depression every day my greatest hero _person_ suffered from depression and he changed the world and stopped the suffering of potentially billions of people lincoln was sure he wasnt cut out for politics or the presidents office he was full of self doubt and worry he thought he would ruin america instead he became arguably the greatest president to ever live because he didnt let depression or suicidal thoughts win he fought every day to make things better the list of how many people live and lived with major depression disorder will shock you_url_ suicidal means you think things can only get worse or never get better you probably think youre worthless im going to tell you this isnt true your life is worth everything to me to your loved ones to anyone who has known you you have value you have meaning all you have to do is believe it come back to the world it is a wonderful place because we can feel pain because we suffer we know what is good because we have pain we know pleasure find your life againbecause your life is not entirely your own _person_ back your life because you have value and are worth everything there is nothing in life worth more than living every day one day at a time

i was the first person in my family to ever graduate from high school neither of my parents ever received an education because they grew up as poor farming peasants in mexico they raised me but i was never given any instruments to play nor was i ever placed in any sports or any drama classes or selfdefense classes or classes that bred hobbies or taught any skills that would have made me even somewhat of an interesting person i dont come from money or a background that values education or ambition i realized way too late into my life that i missed out on a proper childhood i spent my summers and free time at home watching tv and playing video games rather than going to camps or discovering an intellectual interest or participating in sports programs or engaging in any social activity ive been diagnosed with a mild form of autism and have also been diagnosed with intense general anxiety even if i try to connect with others i cant im just too different not even with my family do i feel a close attachmentsomehow i excelled in school and through divine intervention i attended a top private liberal arts college i thought the world would be my oyster but im not cut out for the world i offer nothing and dont have the social skillset or any of the artistic or academic talents to mesh with any of the school clubs or its members i was ill suited for higher society but now im too educated and too ambitious to go back from where i came fromeveryone around me is being elected to leadership positions and attending conferences and earning internships to elite corporations and organizations and i struggle just to keep up academicallyi used to try so hard to fight i saw myself as an isolated fighter who had to navigate the cruel difficult world on my own i sacrificed my health to push myself give it all i had but even when i put twice the effort as everyone else i still finish behind everyone i kept trying and fighting i refused to go down i needed to believe that i was worth something and needed to prove to myself that i was capable of doing something worthwhile for everytime i faltered i pushed and fought harder but i still failednow ive reached my limit im not meant for this world i had nothing and i still have nothing im just a freak to everyone i tried and i gave everything to my cause but it was all in vain i guess im just some nervous autistic low life who can barely do anything right im tired of fighting by myself im tired i hate myself and i hate my thoughts i cant do it anymore i just want to rest forever i wish there was a heaven because i dont want to be here anymore 20 years and nothing to my name im tired of fighting i just want to rest easy and sleep away the rest if eternity ive never said this before but it feels good to finally get this out of me now i can rest easy
but personally all you guys are my heroes i just wanted to let you all know and that i hope you continue helping these unfortunate people
